mapper.insert: insert into base_teacher (id, teacher_code, name, password, age, address, email, phone, number, img_file, status, profession, is_deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{teacherCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
